amendatorysection.catchline: County officers; suspension pending trial; vacancy; how filled.
amendatorysection.para: When the accused is an officer of the court, and is suspended, the court may supply his place by appointment for the term.

annotation.para: "Suspended", as used in this section, is not synonymous with "removed", as used in first section of article. State ex rel. Dodson v. Meeker, 19 Neb. 444, 27 N.W. 427 (1886).
